title: Celery Potato Soup
description: Enjoy the simplicity of this raw celery soup that has delicious flavor with minimal work involved.
ingredients: 1 medium (260 g) russet potatoes, cooked, halved
1 cup (240 ml) Cashew Milk [or milk of choice]
directions: Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure the lid.
Run the Hot Soup Program or start the blender on its lowest speed, then quickly increase to its highest speed. Blend for 5 minutes 45 seconds.
